name: cquant
description: A fast and native image palette generator

scripts.test: npm run predev && node ./test/test.js && node ./test/api-test.js && node ./test/perf.js && node ./script/build-deploy.js
scripts.predev: npm install image-palette image-pixels sharp which prebuild
scripts.build: node-gyp clean && node-gyp configure && node-gyp build

author: xVanTuring
